title: Video Content Gap
description: Competitors heavily investing in short-form video (Reels/TikTok) while our video content is limited. Opportunity to capture engagement.
data_sources: ['APIFY competitor scraping', 'AI analysis ANLZ_001-050', 'Market trend data']
key_findings: ['Competitor A: 60% of content is video', 'Competitor B: Reels averaging 3x engagement vs. static', 'Our video content: <10% of total', 'Video completion rates 75%+ for ice cream category']
strategic_recommendations: ['Increase video content to 40% of total posts', 'Invest in Reels creation workflow', 'Repurpose existing content into video format', 'Partner with local food influencers for authentic content']
resource_requirements: ['Video production equipment/software', 'Content creator budget: $2000/month', 'Video editing training for team']
kpi_targets: ['40% video content by Dec 2025', 'Avg view rate >60%', 'Engagement rate +30%']

title: Gen Z Weekend Pattern
description: Data shows Gen Z engagement peaks Saturday 2-4 PM, with highest conversion on impulse purchases. Currently under-targeting this window.
data_sources: ['Facebook Raw Data - engagement patterns', 'AI Analysis - audience demographics', 'A/B test results from tEOYKf88Pi5VzjSO']
key_findings: ['Saturday 2-4 PM: 2.5x normal engagement from 18-24 age group', 'Impulse purchase rate 40% higher on weekends', 'Visual-first content (Reels/Stories) performs 3x better', 'Friend-tagging increases reach by 60%']
strategic_recommendations: ['Create dedicated Saturday afternoon posting schedule', 'Develop weekend-specific content calendar', 'Test impulse-focused messaging (FOMO, limited offers)', 'Leverage Stories and Reels format', 'Implement friend-tagging incentives']
ab_test_suggestions: [{'test_id': 'AB_AUD01', 'variation_a': 'Weekend generic content', 'variation_b': 'Weekend FOMO messaging', 'metric': 'conversion_rate', 'duration_days': 21}, {'test_id': 'AB_AUD02', 'variation_a': 'Standard posting time', 'variation_b': 'Saturday 2-4 PM', 'metric': 'engagement_rate', 'duration_days': 21}]
resource_requirements: ['Content planning adjustment', 'No additional budget', 'Analytics monitoring setup']
kpi_targets: ['Weekend sales +20%', 'Sat 2-4 PM engagement +50%', 'Gen Z audience share +15%']

title: Emotional vs Rational Messaging Balance
description: Analysis shows emotional appeal content outperforms rational (features/benefits) by 2.1x, but our current mix is 50/50. Optimal balance identified.
data_sources: ['AI Analysis Results - 200+ ads analyzed', 'Competitor benchmarking', 'Engagement correlation data']
key_findings: ['Emotional appeal ads: 8.2% avg engagement', 'Rational ads: 3.9% avg engagement', 'Optimal mix: 70% emotional, 30% rational', 'Best emotional triggers: nostalgia, joy, social connection', 'Bangkok market responds to family/friend messaging']
strategic_recommendations: ['Shift content mix to 70/30 emotional/rational', 'Develop emotional storytelling templates', 'Use rational messaging for new product launches only', 'Test local cultural emotional triggers (Thai family values)', 'Create emotional content pillars: celebration, togetherness, childhood nostalgia']
resource_requirements: ['Content pillar development', 'Copywriting training: emotional storytelling', 'Cultural consultant for Thai market']

title: APIFY Account Rotation Optimization
description: Current APIFY usage shows uneven distribution across 3 accounts. Optimizing rotation can save 15-20% monthly costs.
key_findings: ['Account 1 (linemind): 45% usage, $68/month', 'Account 2 (todxongdur): 35% usage, $52/month', 'Account 3 (tripletreeandyun): 20% usage, $30/month', 'Peak usage causes overage charges on Account 1', 'Scraping times not optimized for API limits']
strategic_recommendations: ['Implement round-robin account rotation', 'Stagger scraping schedules across accounts', 'Set usage caps per account', 'Monitor and alert at 80% threshold', 'Negotiate volume discount with APIFY']
resource_requirements: ['Workflow schedule adjustment', 'Monitoring dashboard setup', 'No additional cost']
kpi_targets: ['Monthly APIFY cost <$130', 'Overage charges: 0', 'Account utilization balanced Â±5%']
